name: Thunderheard
description:
Third person game inspired by the Cherokee tribe. Action and adventure on an open map where there is no mission order, but you must find a way to rescue the subjugated brothers

-Inspired by facts and historical events. The development of the game is not directly based on real events or characters.-

- 1828 -
The Cherokees are forced to leave their land. This small family was expropriated from the land and subjected to slave labor. While big governments turn their backs on the situation, they will seek to be united again
